meanings.sent1: The party had so much pizzazes with all the colorful decorations.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit had a lot of pizzazes with the sparkly sequins.
meanings.sent3: The clown added pizzazes to the show by juggling colorful balls.
meanings.sent4: Her energetic dance moves brought pizzazes to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display lit up the sky with pizzazes of light.

meanings.definition: Pizzazes: third person singular present of pizzazz
meanings.sent1: She pizzazes her presentations with interesting facts.
meanings.sent2: He always pizzazes up his stories with exciting twists.
meanings.sent3: The chef pizzazes the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: The artist pizzazes the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The musician pizzazes the song with catchy melodies.
